column4: Gnome-WARNING **: invalid gnome config path '=/section/key' GLib-GObject-WARNING **: <-- getting that in console when upgrading
if you ran `sudo update-manager -c` I could see that happening.
you want to delete all hidden directories?
rm -r .* will delete all hidden directories *and* files
Thats what happens when you do .* , which I suggested tht you probably didnt want to do.,
There are a lot of settings in there you probably dont want to remove.
Perhaps you should clarify what you mean by "why does ubuntu need to upgrade flash"?
